dcterms:creator: Wade A. Smith
Robert B. Randall
dcterms:description: The CWRU dataset includes rolling element bearing diagnostics data, providing a benchmark for fault diagnosis studies. It contains various fault states induced by inner race, ball, and outer race faults, along with normal baseline data.
dcterms:title: CWRU

dcterms:creator: Dean Lee
Vincent Siu
Rick Cruz
C. J. Yetman
dcterms:description: The MFPT dataset consists of vibration data collected under different fault conditions, including defects in the outer ring, inner ring, and normal states, making it suitable for multi-class fault classification tasks.
dcterms:title: MFPT

dcterms:creator: Huan Huang
dcterms:description: The Ottawa dataset contains vibration signals of rolling bearings collected under various loading conditions and rotational speeds, providing a comprehensive resource for fault diagnosis across multiple classes.
dcterms:title: Ottawa
